name: Baby Shoes
description: Adorable and comfortable baby shoes for little feet. Made with soft materials to support natural foot development.

name: Organic Baby Milk
description: Nutrient-rich organic baby milk formula for healthy growth and development. Made with natural ingredients.

name: Baby Cereals
description: Delicious and nutritious baby cereals packed with essential vitamins and minerals. Perfect for introducing solids.

name: Baby Snacks
description: Healthy and tasty baby snacks made with natural ingredients. Ideal for on-the-go munching.

name: Baby Diapers
description: Ultra-absorbent and comfortable baby diapers for day and night protection. Gentle on delicate skin.

name: Baby Wipes
description: Soft and gentle baby wipes for quick and easy cleanup. Enriched with soothing ingredients for sensitive skin.

name: Baby Bath Tub
description: Spacious and ergonomic baby bath tub for safe and enjoyable bathing. Features non-slip design for added security.

name: Baby Shampoo
description: Gentle and tear-free baby shampoo to cleanse and nourish delicate hair and scalp. Hypoallergenic formula.

name: Baby Onesies
description: Cozy and adorable baby onesies made from soft and breathable fabric. Perfect for everyday wear and playtime.

name: Baby Swaddle Blankets
description: Snug and secure baby swaddle blankets for a peaceful night's sleep. Made from premium quality materials.

name: Baby Carrier
description: Convenient and comfortable baby carrier for hands-free carrying. Adjustable straps for a custom fit.

name: Baby Stroller
description: Stylish and durable baby stroller for smooth and enjoyable outings. Features multiple recline positions and ample storage.

name: Baby Car Seat
description: Safe and secure baby car seat for stress-free travel. Adjustable harness and side-impact protection for added safety.
